Description.Text: Victoria Buildings is a stunning grade II listed property and provides beautiful contemporary apartments with a combination of the old exposed brickwork and new steelwork. The ideal place to stay for business or pleasure, conveniently located opposite the Printworks and adjacent to the Arndale Shopping Centre, close to all that Manchester has to offer. The apartments accommodate between one and eight guests, offering many home comforts and suitable for both short and long stays. Each fully furnished apartment incorporates modern kitchens and complimentary internet access; each has a 32-inch LCD TV, open plan living and dining areas and private bathroom with complimentary toiletries. All apartments are inclusive of all utilities and come with bedding and towels. Reception is open 7 days a week between 10am and 8pm Monday to Friday, 11am to 7pm on Saturdays and 12noon to 4pm on Sundays and UK Bank Holidays. A 24 hour on-call manager is provided outside of these hours together with an out-of-hours check-in facility. Disabled access is available, on request, which include wide entry doors and a large bathroom. PLEASE NOTE a security deposit of 250.00 GBP, per apartment, will be required on arrival and is refundable subject to conditions.

An ideal city centre location, located opposite the Printworks and just a 5 minute walk from Victoria Railway Station. With access to all Manchesters attractions, including shopping for the style conscious, clubs & bars for the party animals, restaurants & cocktail bars for the socialites and for business guests the apartments are just a short walk from Manchesters newest business district. The apartments are 2 miles from Manchester City Football Club and a 25 minute walk from Granada TV Studios and are also close to all major transport links for easy access to all Greater Manchester has to offer.

1 Bedroom Executive Apartment - 1 bedroom luxury loft style apartment with 1 main bathroom with shower. Furnished to a high standard with fully fitted kitchen, incorporating oven, microwave, refrigerator, washer/dryer & all crockery, cutlery, glasses & cookware. There is also an open plan living & dining area, LCD TV with freeview, DVD player, stereo with iPod dock (on request), free wired internet access & free toiletries. There is a secure video entry system and housekeeping service & rates are inclusive of all utilities, bedding & towels. Reception is open 7 days a week between 10am & 8pm Monday to Friday, 11am to 7pm on Saturdays & 12noon to 4pm on Sundays & UK Bank Holidays. A 24 hour on-call manager is provided outside of these hours together with an out-of-hours check-in facility. PLEASE NOTE a security deposit of 250.00 GBP, per apartment, will be required on arrival and is refundable subject to conditions.
2 Bedroom Executive Apartment - 2 bedroom luxury loft style apartment with 2 double beds (some have single beds). 1 bathroom with shower & balcony in some. Furnished to a high standard, each apartment incorporates modern kitchens fitted with an oven, microwave, refrigerator, washer/dryer and all crockery, cutlery, glasses and cookware. There is also an open plan living & dining area, LCD TV with freeview, DVD player, stereo with iPod dock (on request), free wired internet access & free toiletries. Housekeeping service and rates are inclusive of all utilities, bedding & towels. Reception is open 7 days a week between 10am & 8pm Monday to Friday, 11am to 7pm on Saturdays & 12noon to 4pm on Sundays & UK Bank Holidays. A 24 hour on-call manager is provided outside of these hours together with an out-of-hours check-in facility. PLEASE NOTE a security deposit of 250.00 GBP, per apartment, will be required on arrival & is refundable subject to conditions.
2 Bedroom Executive Apartments- Sleeps 6 - 2 bedroom luxury loft style apartment. 2 double beds & 2 sofa beds (some have single beds). Main bathroom plus en-suite & balcony in some. Furnished to a high standard, incorporating modern kitchens fitted with an oven, microwave, refrigerator, washer/dryer and all crockery, cutlery, glasses & cookware. There is also an open plan living & dining area, LCD TV with freeview, DVD player, stereo with iPod dock (on request), free wired internet access & free toiletries. Housekeeping service and rates are inclusive of all utilities, bedding & towels. Reception is open 7 days a week between 10am & 8pm Monday to Friday, 11am to 7pm on Saturdays & 12noon to 4pm on Sundays & UK Bank Holidays. A 24 hour on-call manager is provided outside of these hours together with an out-of-hours check-in facility. PLEASE NOTE a security deposit of 250.00 GBP, per apartment, will be required on arrival & is refundable subject to conditions.
